backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, access control checks, health endpoint, and extensive resident-related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and test IDs for a toggle-switch UI update.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v22-to-pro: Release document outlining promotion of Draft Version 22 to production with checklists and verification steps.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v27-to-pro: Release document describing promotion of Draft Version 27 to production with process steps, checklists, and rollback plan.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, theming for light/dark modes, and base style resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root mount point, and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, resilient actor initialization, routing, boot state handling, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays a resident's ADL records in a table and provides a modal to add new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record, validating required fields and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with optional text and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Presents deployment or initialization errors with retry, logout, and diagnostic detail display options.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter profile details, select role, and optionally link resident IDs before saving.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the app logo with variant-based sizing.
Defines the main application layout with header, auth controls, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident's MAR records with medication names and includes a modal to add new entries when allowed.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for adding a MAR record, collecting medication, time, staff member, and notes before submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/medications/admi: Exports the list of valid medication administration routes and a helper to include custom route values.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Displays active and discontinued medications with edit, discontinue, and reactivate actions, grouped into sections.
Main medications tab showing a resident’s medications with options to add, edit, and discontinue when permitted.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for creating a new medication with fields for dosage, route, times, physician, notes, and PRN option.
Modal for editing an existing medication, allowing updates to dosage, route, times, physician, notes, and PRN status.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Renders a badge showing a resident’s code status as either DNR or Full Code with styled variants.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal form for creating a new resident, including personal info, physicians, contacts, medications, insurance, and pharmacy details.
Modal for editing existing resident information with tabs for basic details, physicians, and pharmacy, updating data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Print-only component that renders a resident profile report with demographics, physicians, medications, and optional signature block.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of daily vitals for a resident and provides a button to record new vitals if permitted.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form to enter and submit daily vital measurements for a resident.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, resident data, permissions, and related backend resources via an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and caches a resilient backend actor tied to the current identity, with automatic retries and query invalidation when the actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and a healthcare-themed OKLCH color palette, enforcing solid backgrounds for UI elements and print-friendly defaults.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Implements helper functions for determining user permissions and labels based on user type and admin status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Renders the resident dashboard with search, filtering, sorting, stats, and a modal to add new residents using query hooks for data.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Renders a resident profile with tabs, modals, medication actions, printing, and a toggle for physician signature fields, using multiple data queries and edit permissions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings UI allowing toggling and saving of display preferences, particularly the resident profile report visibility.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Implements timezone‑safe date parsing and age calculation utilities, plus simple age formatting.
frontend/src/utils/errorDiagnostics.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into structured diagnostic objects and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, and the new request regarding styling of the physician signature toggle switch.
